word: Keep clear of debt. Hire as little as possible. This hiring a little here and there, little driblets constantly going out for jobs done will keep you embarrassed all the time. Take good care of what you have already and lay out as little work as possible. Do what you can and depend not on hired help. . . . May you be guided aright is our prayer.--Letter 18, 1870, pp. 5, 6. (To Edson and Emma White, Nov. 9, 1870.)
